title: [Large-scale] Instructional Design-Based Language Learning Experience Development for Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate language proficiency and grasp of instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Learner-centered design emphasizing task applicability for current practitioners. Development of strategic learning experiences for comprehensive assessments

learning_goals: Within one week, learners can analyze three provided language learning materials (text/multimedia) and write a design document specifying learning objectives, content types, and assessment methods according to a given template.

Applying teacher-led design principles (ADDIE model), learners can develop three types of learner-customized activity scenarios (gamification, project-based, cooperative learning) and achieve an average score of 4 or higher on a 5-point expert evaluation rubric.
Design a language education module integrating instructional design elements (objectives, assessment, materials, methods).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
